mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.teacher_id, u.real_name as teacher_real_name, COUNT(DISTINCT sc.student_id) as studentCount, COUNT(DISTINCT r.id) as resourceCount, COUNT(DISTINCT h.id) as homeworkCount FROM course c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.teacher_id = u.id LEFT JOIN student_course sc ON c.id = sc.course_id LEFT JOIN resource r ON c.id = r.course_id LEFT JOIN homework h ON c.id = h.course_id WHERE c.id = #{id} GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.description, c.teacher_id, u.real_name
